DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of low dose quetiapine for the prophylaxis of delirium in critically ill patients in medical intensive care unit.
DOC.brief_title: Prophylactic Quetiapine on Delirium Prevention in Critically Ill Patients
DOC.criteria: Greater than or equal to 19 years of age, admitting to medical ICU, anticipated to stay more than 72hours Female patients who are pregnant or breastfeeding active delirium Received other antipsychotic drug before attend the study severe bradycardia alcohol intoxication No written consent from the legal representatives Being ill with renal or hepatic failure
